Title: Let's Kill Hitler (2)
Plot: In the desperate search for Melody Pond, the TARDIS crash lands in Thirties Berlin, as the time-travelling drama returns for the second half of the series shown earlier in the year. The Doctor comes face to face with the greatest war criminal in the Universe. And Hitler. Old friendships are tested to their limits as the Doctor suffers the ultimate betrayal and learns a harsh lesson in the cruelest warfare of all. As precious time ebbs away, the Doctor must teach his adversaries that time travel
ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
GuestStars: Alex Kingston, Frances Barber, Nina Toussaint-White, Caitlin Blackwood, Ezekiel Wigglesworth, Maya Glace-Green, Richard Dillane, Philip Rham, Paul Bentley, Eva Alexander, Mark Killeen
